member.summary: The Provisioning Security Client implementation for TPM.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Provisioning.Security.SecurityProviderTpmHsm.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SecurityProviderTpmHsm class using the system TPM.
member.remarks: Calls to the TPM library can potentially return a or a if your TPM hardware does not support the relevant API call.
member.param: The Device Provisioning Service Registration Id.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SecurityProviderTpmHsm class using the specified TPM module.
member.remarks: Calls to the TPM library can potentially return a or a if your TPM hardware does not support the relevant API call.
member.param: The Device Provisioning Service Registration Id.

member.summary: Activates an identity key within the TPM device.
member.remarks: Calls to the TPM library can potentially return a or a if your TPM hardware does not support the relevant API call.

member.summary: Signs the data using the previously activated identity key.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Provisioning.Security.SecurityProviderTpmHsm.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the SecurityProviderTpmHsm and optionally disposes of the managed resources.
member.remarks: Calls to the TPM library can potentially return a or a if your TPM hardware does not support the relevant API call.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to releases only unmanaged resources.
